metadata.name: The Hate Map
metadata.author: Addressable Media
metadata.summary: Over 900 hate groups operate in the US. according to the Southern Poverty Law Center
metadata.description: The Southern Povery Law Center tracks over 900 Hate Groups that operate in the U.S.

The explosive rise in hate group membership has been driven by anger over Latino immigration and projections showing whites will no longer hold a majority by 2040. Participation in these groups accelerated in 2009, the year President Obama took office.
